refnamediv.refpurpose: Get version of an ID3 tag

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: id3_get_version retrieves the version(s) of the ID3 tag(s) in the MP3 file. As a tag can contain ID3 v1.x and v2.x tags, the return value of this function should be bitwise compared with the predefined constants ID3_V1_0, ID3_V1_1 and ID3_V2.

note.simpara: Instead of a filename you may also pass a valid stream resource.

example.title: id3_get_version example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$version = id3_get_version( "path/to/example.mp3" );
if ($version & ID3_V1_0) {
    echo "Contains a 1.x tag\n";
}
if ($version & ID3_V1_1) {
    echo "Contains a 1.1 tag\n";
}
if ($version & ID3_V2) {
    echo "Contains a 2.x tag\n";
}
?>
example.screen: Contains a 1.x tag Contains a 1.1 tag

refsect1.para: If a file contains an ID3 v1.1 tag, it always contains a 1.0 tag, as version 1.1 is just an extension of 1.0.
See also id3_get_tag, id3_set_tag and id3_remove_tag.
